name: Blind (itch) (Dead Pixels)
description:
This is our prototype game for the GGJ 2017, made in less than 48 hours based on the keyword "waves".
We plan to continue developing this project until finishing a whole complete experience so we'll happy to hear about your thoughts :)

Blind is horror strategy game about a blinded child who tries to go to her parent's room because she's afraid of the night's monsters. Dare to fool your fears in darkness, where the sounds are your best and worse tool.

Controls:

A: Move left D: Move right W: Hide (in the curtains) Spacebar: Clap hands
